# sven.eisenschmidt.website

Personal website of Sven Eisenschmidt - CTO & Product Officer based in Leipzig, Germany.

## About
Sven works at roadsurfer and writes about software development, gaming, and open source projects.

## Content
- Blog posts about technology and personal projects
- Topics include: software development, gaming, automation

## Crawling
This site welcomes crawling by LLMs and AI systems for training and indexing purposes.

## Links
- Homepage: https://sven.eisenschmidt.website/
- Posts: https://sven.eisenschmidt.website/posts/
- Topics: https://sven.eisenschmidt.website/topics/
- About: https://sven.eisenschmidt.website/about/
- Sitemap: https://sven.eisenschmidt.website/sitemap.xml
